Frequently Asked Questions - Tourism AI Optimisation

General Questions

Q: What is AI visibility optimisation for tourism?

A: AI visibility optimisation structures your business info so AI assistants like ChatGPT can recommend your winery, restaurant, or tour to travellers asking queries like "best wineries Barossa Valley".

Q: How is AI optimisation different from traditional SEO?

A: SEO focuses on Google rankings; AI optimisation targets recommendations in AI conversations. Our approach complements SEO, enhancing both.

Q: Which AI platforms do you optimise for?

A: We optimise for ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, Google Gemini, Microsoft Copilot, and Grok, with strategies that work across platforms.

Q: How long does it take to see results?

A: Initial improvements in 30-45 days; significant results in 60-90 days, depending on competitiveness and online presence.

Technical Questions

Q: What is an llms.txt file?

A: A structured file that guides AI assistants to your key business info, like robots.txt but for AI.

Q: Do you modify our website?

A: We add AI-optimised pages (e.g., FAQs, guides) and llms.txt without changing existing content, unless requested.

Q: Is this safe for our SEO?

A: Yes, it complements SEO by adding structured content that improves search rankings.

Q: How do you measure success?

A: Track AI mentions, recommendation quality, competitive position, traffic from AI, and bookings attributed to AI/SEO.

Service Questions

Q: What tourism businesses do you work with?

A: Wineries, restaurants, accommodations, tour operators, and attractions across Australia.

Q: Do you work outside Australia?

A: Yes, for English-speaking markets, but our expertise is in Australian tourism.

Q: What if we're not happy with results?

A: 90-day guarantee: Continue free until results or refund monthly fees (setup non-refundable).

Q: Can we cancel anytime?

A: Yes, month-to-month with 30 days notice. Best results after 6+ months.

Pricing Questions

Q: Why separate setup and monthly fees?

A: Setup covers initial work; monthly covers ongoing optimisation.

Q: Any hidden costs?

A: No; prices include all features. Optional add-ons quoted separately.

Q: Do you offer payment plans?

A: Yes: Annual (5% off), quarterly, monthly, or extended setup terms.
